column1: Oxazepam is a medicine used to treat anxiety and symptoms of alcohol withdrawal.
Benzodiazepines are the most common prescription drugs used in suicide attempts.

The person may receive: - Activated charcoal - Airway support, including oxygen, breathing tube through the mouth (intubation), and breathing machine (ventilator) - Blood and urine test - Chest x-ray - EKG (electrocardiogram, or heart tracing) - Fluids through a vein (intravenous or IV) - Laxative - Medicines to treat symptoms, including flumazenil, an antidote to reverse the effect of the poison
